settings.title: (Hot Hair) Summer is here!
settings.text:
Time to change your hair care routine to protect your hair from the burning sun, chlorine and salt water.

Keep your hair healthy with the help of these seven essential hair care products that will leave your hair free of damage.

settings.subtitle: 7 HEALTHY-HAIR ESSENTIALS YOU NEED THIS SUMMER
settings.title: 1. OVERNIGHT REPAIR SERUM
settings.text:
After a day full of swimming, tanning and partying, the best way of taking care of your hair is by sleeping and letting the Overnight Repair Serum do its thing. You will wake up with soft and repaired hair, visibly improved by the natural oils and extracts. It is also the perfect frizz and split end protector.

USE: Use as an intensive overnight treatment for soft and shiny hair the next day. Apply 2-3 drops (depending on the length and thickness of your hair) to the palm of your hand, rub your hands together and apply gently through towel dry or dry hair. Protect your pillow with a towel during the night. Rinse out thoroughly the next morning and wash the hair as normal.

settings.title: 2. DETANGLING BRUSH
settings.text:
This is the best brush for detangling the hair, especially when it is wet. The fibers are strong t go through the knots but flexible enough to massage the scalp, making an enjoyable detangling experience instead of hurting the hair.

USE: After using Sun Protection Spray, use the Detangling Brush to brush the hair in a downward motion to preserve the hair's natural direction, starting with the tips and working upwards.

settings.title: 3. DRY SHAMPOO
settings.text:
If there is a product necessary for every busy traveler is the Dry Shampoo. When in a rush, there is no need to stress over unwashed hair because it will absorb product buildup, oils, and impurities. This is a fantastic way to extend your summer blowout.

USE: Shake well before use. Spray evenly between layers of hair 20-30 cm from the head. Let it dry, spread with your fingers and brush the excess Dry Shampoo out of the hair.

settings.title: 4. SUN PROTECTION SPRAY
settings.text:
This summer-must is formulated with protection against UVA and UVB rays, helping nourish and condition sun or sea-exposed hair. It can be applied before and during exposure to the sun to prevent damage, but it also works as a hydration treatment after a day at the beach or pool.

USE: The Sun Protection Spray comparable with a sunscreen; Apply to towel dry or dry hair, repeat regularly and do rinse.

settings.title: 5. TEXTURIZING SALT SPRAY
settings.text:
The sea salt-based spray is an excellent product to add definition and texture to your hair, as well as providing flexible hold and control, which is particularly important to achieve any summer hairstyle. It is also humidity resistant, so it is perfect for the most heated conditions.

USE: Spray lightly to damp hair roots to give support or to dry hair to add texture. Blow-dry the hair for a full bodied hairstyle with maximum hold.

settings.title: 6. LEAVE IN CONDITIONER
settings.text:
A summer essential formulated with protective UV-filters. This spray will also help untangle the hair and make sure to smoothen the hair cuticles, leaving the hair shiny and conditioned.

USE: Just spray it, divide he hair to comb through it and leave it on with no need to rinse, perfect for a busy summer day.

settings.title: 7. TEXTURIZING VOLUME SPRAY
settings.text:
To keep the hair up when there is no time for a full blowout, the Texturizing Volume spray ensures an instant root lift with a strong hold or the ultimate volume throughout the day.

USE: Shake well before use. Shake vell and spray from a distance of 15 20 cm | 7 8 " onto the roots of damp/dry hair.
